trans-unit.source: Renders the contained 3-D content within the 2-D layout bounds of the Viewport3D element.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza o conteúdo 3D contido dentro dos limites de layout 2D do elemento Viewport3D.

trans-unit.source: The Viewport3D element renders 3-D content while providing features consistent with <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> objects including 2-D layout, clipping, and input events.
trans-unit.target: O elemento Viewport3D renderiza 3D conteúdo fornecendo recursos consistentes com <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>objetos incluindo layout 2D, corte e eventos de entrada.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: When this element is included as the content of a layout element like <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>, specify the size of the Viewport3D by setting its <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> properties (inherited from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>).
trans-unit.target: Quando esse elemento é incluído como o conteúdo de um elemento de layout como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>, especifique o tamanho do Viewport3D definindo seu <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>Propriedades (herdado de <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>).</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>

trans-unit.source: Viewport3D extends 2-D hit testing into the 3-D scene by extruding the 2-D hit test point into a 3-D ray.
trans-unit.target: Viewport3D estende 2D teste de clique na cena 3D por extrusão o ponto de teste de hit 2D em um raio 3D.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.HitTest%2A> method to return detailed hit result information about the hit visual, model, mesh, and point of intersection.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.HitTest%2A>método para retornar detalhadas ocorrências resultado informações sobre o visual de ocorrência, modelo, malha e o ponto de interseção.</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.HitTest%2A>

trans-unit.source: On [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_whistler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], if the display color quality is not set to 32-bit or 16-bit, the Viewport3D might not render as expected.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_whistler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], se a qualidade de cor de exibição não está definida como 32 bits ou de 16 bits, o Viewport3D podem não ser renderizadas como esperado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Causes the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref> to arrange its visual content to fit a specified size.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"> </xref> para organizar o conteúdo visual de acordo com um tamanho especificado.

trans-unit.source: Size that <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref> will assume.
trans-unit.target: Tamanho <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"> </xref> assumirá.

trans-unit.source: The final size of the arranged <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho final do organizados <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a camera object that projects the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref> to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] surface of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto de câmera que projetos o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] conteúdo a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"> </xref> para o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] superfície do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the viewing projection of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] scene.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa a projeção de exibição do [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] cena.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| > [!NOTE] > The metadata type on this dependency property is , not .
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum | > [!NOTE] > O tipo de metadados sobre essa propriedade de dependência é , não .

trans-unit.source: The camera that projects the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] contents to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] surface.
trans-unit.target: A câmera que projeta o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] de conteúdo para o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] superfície.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Camera*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Camera*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Camera*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref> children of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"> </xref> filhos a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: ##Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.ChildrenProperty>| | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.ChildrenProperty>

trans-unit.source: A collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref> children of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"> </xref> filhos a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> at a specified position in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children*> collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> em uma posição especificada o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children*>coleção do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children*>

trans-unit.source: Position of the element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Posição do elemento na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Visual at the specified position in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Visual na posição especificada no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children*>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children*>

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.Viewport3DAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria e retorna um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.Viewport3DAutomationPeer"> </xref> objeto para este <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.Viewport3DAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.Viewport3DAutomationPeer"></xref>objeto para este <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro oferece suporte a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infraestrutura e não se destina a ser usado diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: An object to add as a child.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto a ser adicionado como um filho.

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro oferece suporte a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infraestrutura e não se destina a ser usado diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: A string to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres para adicionar ao objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets an integer that represents the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> objects in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ModelVisual3D.Children*> collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor inteiro que representa o número de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> objetos no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ModelVisual3D.Children*>coleção do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ModelVisual3D.Children*>

trans-unit.source: Integer that represents the number of Visuals in the Children collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inteiro que representa o número de elementos visuais na coleção de filhos a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"> </xref>.
